text: Tiger, Blood in the Mouth () is a 2016 Argentine Italian action drama movie directed by Hernán Belón. It stars Leonardo Sbaraglia, Eva De Dominici, Érica Bianchi, Osmar Núñez, Claudio Rissi and Camila Zolezzi. It was distributed by Netflix. ==Other websites== * Category:2016 action movies Category:2016 drama movies Category:Argentine action movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Italian action movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies set in Argentina
title: Tiger, Blood in the Mouth
